Luminaris.description: The weakened capital of Eryndral. Merchants whisper of shadows stirring beyond the gates.

Shademire Woods.description: Twisted trees block out the sun. The air feels heavy, and faint eyes glimmer in the dark.

Crumbling Catacombs.description: Ancient tombs beneath Luminaris, now cracked open. Echoes of movement hint at lurking danger.

Rusted Sword.description: An old sword, barely sharp, but better than bare hands.
